text: Hey. HubSpot-built modules make use of the Styles tab as seen below. Is this open to developers to populate? I’ve noticed by changing the “tab” json attribute in fields.json to something invalid you can get a helpful error divulging the valid values - but seems to be no documentation on this usage (guessing it’s not supported) will this be something unlocked in the future?

Does anyone know if there is a way to add classes to links within a richtext field? I am trying to provide the alibility for our content team to style a link to look like a button within the richtext with a class (without going into source)
